examples.text:
1 - Müstamel elektrik bataryası ve teferruatı:
175 kilo Tirfon
70 " Perçin çivi[…]
examples.translation: From the office of the general director of the tobacco monopoly

etymology: From French tire-fond. Nişanyan dates the word to 1934; the quotation below shows it was in use by the start of 1931.
